Yaak Javadoc

Packages
yaak.agent This package implements agent operations.
yaak.agent.behavior This package provides foundation-level agent behavior.
yaak.agent.communication This package implements lower level communications services.
yaak.agent.communication.discovery This package implements dynamic discovery operations.
yaak.agent.communication.event This package provides event monitoring for low-level communications.
yaak.agent.communication.jdmk This package implements a JDMK-based communications server.
yaak.agent.communication.jmx This package implements a JMX-based communications server.
yaak.agent.event This package provides event handling for agent contexts.
yaak.agent.message This package implements higher level, agent-to-agent messaging.
yaak.agent.message.event This package provides event monitoring for message-level communications.
yaak.collection This package supports general-purpose object pooling.
yaak.concurrent This package provides concurrency-related constructs.
yaak.core This package provides core services such as logging and property handling.
yaak.model This package provides a world environment for domain modeling.
yaak.model.event This package provides event handling for the domain/world model.
yaak.model.service This package implements a service-oriented delegation strategy.
yaak.ontology This package implements an object-oriented ontology paradigm.
yaak.schedule This package provides general-purpose scheduling and thread pooling.
yaak.sim.schedule This package implements action, action groups, and scheduling.
yaak.util This package provides utility-type operations.
